artist: Artist: Hashiguchi Goyō (self-published); Carver: Takano Shichinosuke; Printer: Akimoto Shōzaburō
creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
description: head and torso of seated woman wearing a grey and pink checked kimono and red, blue and white obi, holding a round red tray on her lap; shiny grey ground
inscription: 大正九年一月 {Taishō kunen ichigatsu} (January 1920)
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper with mica
text: Portrait of Onao おなを, a maid at the Matsuyoshi Inn, Kyoto.
title: Woman Holding a Tray
